content:
Just as you are about to give up hope that you will ever find Bo's letter, you spot an envelope by the side of the trail and see the name Olyv Sol scrawled across the front. This must be it!

It's held shut by a wax seal. It feels like there's something else inside the envelope besides a letter; something small and heavy.

Now you just need to deliver the letter to Olyv. She's likely to be at Lone Tree Station, unless she's already earned her cloak, of course, in which case she'll likely be on patrol somewhere in the Valley.

Flip the LOST LETTER mission to the LETTER FROM BO side. Then choose a Ranger to equip it. Record FOUND BO'S LETTER on your campaign tracker. Discard each letter from each feature in play.

Find Olyv Sol to give her Bo's letter.
